reviewText:
Logans war was entertaining to a degree. Its basically a guy norris raised after his fam got killed. Then him and norris face off with the mob. Kinda over the top but had alot of action.

Presidents man was eh ok.. norris and his daughter get a guy out of jail, train him and he becomes the next presidents man. Norris joins him and saves the day.

Presidents man 2, had a diff president, a diff presidents man..no explanation why? Was this supposed to be the same guy? Was he replaced? Who knows..

These were norris's weaker roles. His later films, he looked really bored. And his asian daughter, while hot, was really annoying and a bit**. Esp in president 2. I give this set 3 stars,only because of logans war being good. The president man movies really wernt that great. Im a norris fan, but those 2 movies bored me. See them if you must..

Don't know what to get your 50+ year old Dad for Christmas?  *Hi-YA* You just found it.
It doesn't matter what the title is, just know you have 3 times the kick-punches and roundhouses that Chuck fans have come to adore.

SHAMELESS CHUCK NORRIS JOKE:
"When Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone, he had 3 missed calls from Chuck Norris!"

I like Chuck Norris' movies anyway. This DVD just happened to include my favorites. As soon as I can afford the full set of Walker Texas Ranger DVDs, I want to get that. His shows are clean and full of action.

Some of Chuck Norris' more recent movies are included in this collection. It is much more like Walker,Texas Ranger but with a little Alias and Le Femme Nikita mixed in. Martial arts with modern weapons and spy warfare with covert anti-terrorism to boot. James Bond with a blackbelt teams with the CIA would be a good description although there is no far-fetched gadgets or bed scenes. Excelsior!

If you like Chuck Norris, you'll love these made for TV movies.  All three were made during the time that Walker, Texas Ranger was on the air.  All three are well done.  One caveat, keep in mind that these are made for TV movies.

Absolutely love Chuck Norris & his movies,always packed with plenty of action,

He does throw in  a bit of humour,can watch his movies over n over,

I enjoyed this video.  I had never seen this video, and I was very pleased with it after viewing it.  As always, Chuck Norris is an excellent actor.  Viewing this product, I could not tell that I had purchased it from amazon.com. Amazon has great quality of videos whether they are new or in used condition.
chuck norris, what else can you say. if he is in the movie it has got to be good.
This collection was superb.  I enjoyed all three films and they were in excellent condition.
All three movies great Chuck Norris action without the usual media blood, gore, sex and foul language.  It is refreshing to see that movies can still be made with a good story and action packed.
The guy's a joke.  His acting sucks and the plots of all his movies are lame.  Save your money.
Great Norris film.

Exceed expectations.  Loved the action and story line. Wish it could have been a longer series.
exactly what I was looking for.

I was happy to receive these DVDs.  They arrived as promised, in excellent packing and condition.  I watched them as soon as possible and enjoyed every moment.  Chuck not only kicks butt; he exhibits acting ability also.  I'm looking forward to gleaning more of his films for my library.
This is a great collection of movies! Action-packed with lots of cool fight scenes! Definitely a must for a Chuck Norris fan!
This is a good moral movie that the whole family can watch together. I would recommend this movie to you as well.
these three movies all in one are great and fun to watch and learn from to and just enjoy yourself

Wonderful flick!  Could wish Chuck's character's would trade less fighting for more depth, but he's certainly got great heart!  I'd love to see him and the great Steve Bacic together; they'd really rock!

A good action collection!  Great for those who like Chuck Norris, action, adventure, or ludicrosity (depending on your perspective).  I enjoy movies where people have solid values, patriotic (not nationalistic), stand for what our Constitution and Flag represent.  I certainly recommend this
Chuck Norris collection!

I really enjoyed this collection of movies, although the second President's Man wasn't nearly as good as the first one. We enjoy Chuck Norris shows at our house and this one fits right in with the rest. We love to watch Chuck kick the bad guy's butt!
Ok dvd, good to watch with your family as there is no cursing and the total story can be explained in 5 seconds.
I like Chuck Norris as a rule and these movies stood up to his usual standard of family clean fun.

These three films are okay. Would  watch them again?  No I wouldn't watch them a second time. They were not really Chuck Norris films, he plays a secondery role in these. He is kind of like the mentor role...
I got this for my daughter who loves Chuck Norris, and she loves to watch it with her entire set of "Walker".
MY SON LOVED THEM WORTH BUYING IT LIKE THIS... I BOUGHT A FEW FOR CHRISTMAS FOR HIM. OTHER MOVIES CHUCK NORRIS HAS. THERE IS NOTHING LIKE THE OLD MOVIES.

If you like Chuck, or want to see what he`s about, check this one out. He`s a classic action hero with clean ethics and admirable values (a rarity). He kicks butt in the low key, modest way only he can. Ladies may not appreciate, but every real man will.

also gift for my husband, but for an action movie set, or as I call grunt movies, they are really great. i kind of like Chuck Norris and this beats  the Texas Rangers series on TV.
would buy from vendor again

My first experience purchasing Amazon video's was very costly.
I was not aware I  had to nominate a region format for my video. In any case surely my postal address would indicate where I wished to view the video.

After all why would I purchase a NTSC format video to view in Indonesia or Australia who use PAL format.

The experience has cost me the equivalent of US$20 for return postage to ensure the returns are received prior to November 1 in order to receive a credit. Now I have been advised one of the series is no longer available, I assume Amazon means in PAL format.

Not an experience I would recommend.

This collection of movies are a must for anyone who likes Chuck Norris.  The President's Man and President's Man 2 are about a person who is picked to protect the President of the US any time something happens to the President or anyone associated with him this person jumps into action and rescues the person and dissolves the situation.  This person is unknown to the President and there are only a hand full of people that know about the position.  Logan's War is about a man who adopts his nephew after his parents are killed and he is orphaned.  Logan has revenge on his mind and wants to kill the person responsible for his parents death.  He can only do it with his uncle's help and learns that revenge sometimes is not the best reason for go after someone.

This is the best of Chuck Norris and it has conspiracy and team action that almost all his fans expect when he does his performance mostly in t.v. series like the president's man and logan's war. I was waiting when the dvd comes out that has these three movies in one collection of chuck norris. I can't hardly wait to watch this movie again and I can surely say that this is Chuck Norris's awesome work.
This item was given as a gift to a special person. Haven't heard any complaints, only seeing him relaxing and enjoying viewing the dvd.
awesome. Love it.
Bought this to go with Norris collection all movies and tv shows........Have his books also.  He is a outstanding man who loves God and Country
All I can say is this dvd is a great purchase if your a chuck norris fan you'll want this one in your collection.

Great movie collection. I really liked The President's Man and enjoyed this collection. The only problem with this DVD is that it doesn't have closed caption. I am hard of hearing but the dialog was fairly easy to follow for me.

If there was an Academy Award for Most Consecutive Neck Snaps, this film would win double awards. Everyone is just minding their own business while Chuck Norris sneaks up behind them, and snaps their neck. Not a single person attempts to shoot Chuck Norris and everyone attempts to beat him by equal karate brawl even though the weapon is easily accessible. Chuck Norris and his sidekick both methodically take out each person at the base with a sneak up neck snap. At the end of the film, the main villain dies from a neck snap. Everyone got their neck snapped minus a few unlucky souls who got a fury of karate chop death.

Overall great film. I really enjoyed the movie collection.
great movies

I can't express how disappointed I was with this purchase. This is all bootleg and copied. I bought it as a gift for my dad and all the movies have issues. The first one does not work until the end, half the movie does not exist on the disk. The second movie keeps freezing like its loading, but its a freaking dvd so its not loading and the 3rd is of horrible quality. Dont waste your money on this.
